list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(core): introduce initial plugin functionality and config
• Add TebexMessage.java for core plugin logic • Implement broadcast, buttons, and Discord webhook features • Include comprehensive default config.yml for customization

task.summary:
feat(project-setup): initialize TebexMessage project
• Add initial IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files • Include Maven POM with project dependencies • Create basic plugin.yml for Spigot plugin structure
This commit sets up the foundational files required for the TebexMessage project, enabling development to commence. It includes various IDE-specific configuration files (compiler, discord, encodings, jarRepositories, material_theme_project_new, misc, modules, vcs, workspace), the main Maven project object model (pom.xml), and the Spigot plugin descriptor (plugin.yml).

feat(utils): add addColor utility class
• Introduce new utility class `addColor.java` • Provides functionality to manage and apply colors • Enhances user experience by supporting color customization

feat(utils): add YamlFile utility class
• Implement new utility class for YAML file handling • Provides methods for loading and saving YAML configurations
Closes #XYZ

feat(utils): add DefaultFontInfo utility class
• Introduce new utility class DefaultFontInfo • Provides information about default font properties for rendering • Supports retrieving font metrics and character width
This commit adds a new utility class DefaultFontInfo to the project. This class is designed to provide essential information regarding default font properties, which is crucial for accurate text rendering. It includes methods for retrieving font metrics and calculating individual character widths. This addition improves the project's ability to handle and display text consistently.

feat(utils): add CenterUtils for message centering
Add a new utility class, CenterUtils, to facilitate centering messages within a given width.
• Provides methods for calculating padding and centering strings • Improves display consistency for in-game messages

feat(manager): add CustomArgManager
• Introduce CustomArgManager for custom argument handling • Simplify argument parsing and management logic • Enhance extensibility for future argument types

feat(manager): add MessageManager for Tebex messages
• Introduce MessageManager class • Handle Tebex message logic • Initial setup for message handling

feat(handler): add BroadcastHandler class
• Implement logic for broadcasting messages • Handle message events from various sources • Provide a centralized point for message dissemination

feat(handler): add BroadcastHandler class
• Implement logic for broadcasting messages • Handle message events from various sources • Provide a centralized point for message dissemination

feat(handler): add ButtonHandler for interactive messages
• Introduce new ButtonHandler class • Enable building interactive BungeeCord TextComponents with buttons • Support configurable text, hover events, and click events (open_url) • Allow for button centering and spacing customization

chore(config): update IntelliJ IDEA workspace settings
• Sync workspace.xml with recent project activity • Record new local tasks and commit messages • Update internal project state and durations

fix(handler): update ButtonHandler to use TextComponent.fromLegacyText
• Refactor button text and hover text to use TextComponent.fromLegacyText • Improves handling of legacy color codes in button components • Ensures proper rendering of formatted text for buttons

chore(build): update Maven POM for shading and dependencies
• Add new relocations for `org.jetbrains` and `org.intellij` libraries • Update IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration • Improve build process by shading additional dependencies

feat(discord): add Discord webhook utility
• Introduce DiscordWebhook.java for sending messages • Enable embedding and custom content in webhooks • Provide methods for easy integration with Discord API

feat(command): add TebexCommandLoader
• Introduce TebexCommandLoader to manage Tebex-related commands • Implements command registration logic for new Tebex functionality • Provides an entry point for integrating Tebex commands into the application

feat(command): add Tebex console command
• Introduce TebexConsoleCommand.java for server-side interaction • Provides initial structure for console commands related to Tebex functionality

feat(config): add initial configuration file
• Introduce default config.yml for TebexMessage • Include settings for API keys, messages, and command aliases

feat(core): introduce initial plugin functionality and config
• Add TebexMessage.java for core plugin logic • Implement broadcast, buttons, and Discord webhook features • Include comprehensive default config.yml for customization
